```{r}
A <- matrix(c(2,5,1,-1,4,3,5,0,-2),3,3,TRUE)
b <- c(-12,-4,-13)
showEqn(A,b)
```
```{r}
Solve(A,b)
```
```{r}
plotEqn3d(A,b)
```

```{r}
echelon(A,b)
```
```{r}
echelon(A,b, verbose=TRUE, fractions=TRUE)
```
```{r}
echelon(A,b, verbose=TRUE)
```
